law.catch_line: Title may be inherited through alien.
law.text: When title is acquired by descent, it shall be no bar to a person taking title through descent that any ancestor through whom he derives his descent from the intestate is or has been an alien.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1396.
